data.name: AssociateLegalAction
data.value: update CKT_DISB_SUPPR_STS set LGA_IDENTIFIER = @lgaIdentifier where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (DSS_GENERATED_ID = @dssGeneratedId)

data.name: DisassociateLegalAction
data.value: update CKT_DISB_SUPPR_STS set LGA_IDENTIFIER = null where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (DSS_GENERATED_ID = @dssGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadCollectionType
data.value: select top(1) COLLECTION_TYPE_ID from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE where COLLECTION_TYPE_ID = @collectionTypeId

data.name: ReadDisbSuppressionStatusHistory1
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, DSS_GENERATED_ID, CLT_SEQUENTIAL_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, TYPE, REASON_TEXT, LGA_IDENTIFIER from CKT_DISB_SUPPR_STS where (DSS_GENERATED_ID = @dssGeneratedId) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)

data.name: ReadDisbSuppressionStatusHistory2
data.value: select CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, DSS_GENERATED_ID, CLT_SEQUENTIAL_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, TYPE, REASON_TEXT, LGA_IDENTIFIER from CKT_DISB_SUPPR_STS where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE in ('P', 'O')) and ( ( (DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) ) or (EFFECTIVE_DATE between cast(@discontinueDate as date) and cast(@effectiveDate as date)) ) and (DSS_GENERATED_ID <> @dssGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadLegalAction1
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadLegalAction2
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where (LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId) and (STANDARD_NO = @standardNo)

data.name: ReadLegalAction3
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where STANDARD_NO = @standardNo

data.name: UpdateDisbSuppressionStatusHistory
data.value: update CKT_DISB_SUPPR_STS set EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate, DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, TYPE = @type, REASON_TEXT = @reasonText where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (DSS_GENERATED_ID = @dssGeneratedId)
